org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap
Class WriteableLdapUserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap.WriteableLdapUserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, WriteableLdapUserService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class WriteableLdapUserServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements WriteableLdapUserService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

An implementation of WriteableLdapService based on LdapTemplate. See /properties/ldap/ldap-write-example.xml.

See Also:

setAuthenticatedContext

public void setAuthenticatedContext(java.lang.String userId,
                                    java.lang.String password)
                             throws LdapException
Description copied from interface: WriteableLdapUserService
Define credentials which will be used for LDAP binding. Usefull when you ask credentials via a forms in your application and you want to bind to LDAP with those credentials.
